Package sagex.phoenix.vfs.sources

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomFoldersSourceFactory
    Simple factory for creating the Custom Folders node.
    FileSystemSourceFactory
    Creates FileSystem folder for the given 'dir' in the option.
    MediaFolderSourceFactory
    Simple Factory that holds a reference to an existing MediaFolder object, and it uses that Folder for all sources.
    PlaylistSourceFactory
    Factory that creates a Playlist Folder for the current playlists
    RSSFeedFactory
    Convenience source for configuring a base XmlSourceFactory for either RSS or Atom feeds
    SageExpressionSourceFactory  
    SageMediaFilesFactory
    Simple factory to create a source using a sage media mask
    SageMediaNodeFactory
    Creates a MediaFolder from a given MediaNode Content String
    SageOnlineVideosFactory  
    SageSourcesFactory
    Simple factory for creating a structured source from a sage media mask.
    TVMediaFilesSourceFactory
    Factory to create a source using sage TV media and allowing filling episode gaps
